record.name: Check if close Problem has associated record is still open.

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript Validation: Check if RFC is still open
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation: Check if RFC is still open
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"returnCode = 0;\u000avar $ = lib.c.$;\u000avar file = vars.$L_file;\u000aif (file[\"isKnownError\"]) {\u000a if ($(\"#problemService\").hasOpenDependRecord(file[\"id\"], \"cm3r\")) {\u000a returnCode = 1;\u000a message = system.functions.scmsg(345, \"pm\");\u000a }\u000a}"}

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript Validation: Check if Interaction is still open
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">""problem"=block.closures in $G.sm.global.environment"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation: Check if Interaction is still open (when ( Expression: "problem"=block.closures in $G.sm.global.environment))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"returnCode = 0;\u000avar $ = lib.c.$;\u000avar file = vars.$L_file;\u000avar count = $(\"#problemService\").countOpenDependRecord(file[\"id\"], \"incidents\");\u000aif (count > 0) {\u000a returnCode = 1;\u000a message = system.functions.scmsg(13, \"us\", [\"problem\", count]);\u000a}"}
